channel.title: Turanism on Dulguun Gantumur
channel.description: Recent content in Turanism on Dulguun Gantumur

item.title: Turko-Mongolic Linguistic Legitimacy for Nationalism
item.description: It is clear to those who have either studied both a Turkic and Mongolic language or has an interest in linguistic, especially historical, that there is a deep connection between these language families.
